title: Some Questions about Pax Aus 2015
body:
So my friend bought our tickets for me so I just want to ask a few questions before i can get them off him.


Will Riot definitely not be at Pax Aus this year?

What skin do you get by sending a picture of your ticket to riot?

Do I just send you the badge/lanyard thing, or a receipt of the order?


If someone with knowledge could reply that would be great {{summoner:31}} 

Thanks,
Yoshi

replies.body: Wait, does Riot really gove you a skin if you just bought PAX tickets? I did not know about this and i bought my tickets moths ago. I also didnt know that Riot wast even going to PAX Aus :( {{item:3070}}
yea but you had to have bought it before, like may or something
im going as an enforcer, do i still get a skin?
i think you only get the skin if you bought tickets before riot announced they weren't going to be at pax aus this year
Yea i know that, but still dont know what to send
